name: email-generator
description: Static HTML email generator based on Electron, Eleventy, webpack, Babel, and PostCSS

scripts.prepack: if [ -e src/css ]; then rm -R src/css; fi; if [ -e src/fonts ]; then rm -R src/fonts; fi; if [ -e src/js ]; then rm -R src/js; fi
scripts.development: npm run-script prepack; npx webpack; npm run-script clean; ELEVENTY_ENV=development npx eleventy --serve
scripts.staging: npm run-script prepack; npx webpack; npm run-script clean; ELEVENTY_ENV=staging npx eleventy
scripts.production: npm run-script prepack; npx webpack; npm run-script clean; ELEVENTY_ENV=production npx eleventy
